duties_responsibilities.duty: Processing and adjudicating GAP benefit requests from various sources such as Contract Holders, Financial Institutions, Third Party Administrators, Dealerships, and Sales Agents.
Determining the payoff balance of the loan, calculating interest, and preparing amortization schedules.
Reviewing claims and claim status, providing timely and accurate resolution by communicating with relevant parties.
Answering claim-related questions via telephone and email professionally and in a timely manner.
Requesting additional documentation and preparing correspondence explaining settlements, adjustments, and denials.
Conducting necessary research to resolve claim issues and following established departmental procedures.
Supporting customer service department call overflow and performing other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate or General Education Degree (GED) required, Associate's Degree preferred.
